alert.note: Alert for Pike; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 7:32PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN PIKE AND NORTHEASTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 732 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Clarktown, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Clarktown, Lucasville, Beaver, Stockdale, Portsmouth Regional Airport, Minford, Linn and Germany. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
